mapper.insert: insert into product (p_name, p_explain, p_category, p_small_category, p_img, p_size, p_price, p_stock, p_thumImg) values (#{p_name},#{p_explain},#{p_category},#{p_small_category},#{p_img},#{p_size},#{p_price},#{p_stock},#{p_thumImg})
mapper.select: select * from product order by p_num desc limit #{startRow},#{pageSize}
